alert.note: Alert for Central Interior (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 06 at 5:38AM AKDT until August 06 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM AKDT THIS EVENING FOR CENTRAL INTERIOR... * AFFECTED AREA...Central Interior. * TIMING...Until 10 PM AKDT this evening. * WINDS...Southeast 15 to 20 mph with gusts to 30 mph. Winds will spread north to Nenana by this afternoon. * HUMIDITY...As low as 25 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Highs in the mid 80s. * IMPACTS...Rapid ignition, growth and spread of fires will be possible.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that conditions are occurring or will occur which could lead to the development of large and dangerous fires. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them, to the public. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.
